message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be perfect for you! I'm offering it to you for $115. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and am interested, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $100. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to go down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that. This product is truly special and I think you'll be happy with it.
